document_data.mainbody: '''The Dragon's Tail''' was a tavern found in [[Scardale Town]] within [[Scardale]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was noted for having a more threatening clientele including thugs and merchants who operated on the black market. [[Zhent]] troops from the [[Zhentilar compound (Scardale)|Zhent compound]] were particularly fond of this establishment.
